Defend.Name: Mix Paint
Defend.Action_String: <User> swirls several colors around, creating a new shade and healing for 7 damage.

Defend.Name: Paint Can
Defend.Action_String: <User> holds up the lid of their paint can, blocking for 2 damage.

Attack.Name: Paint Coat
Attack.Action_String: <User> swipes their brush at <Target>, dealing <Damage> damage.

Attack Crit.Name: Blind
Attack Crit.Action_String: <User> camouflages their face, shielding for 7 damage for 2 turns.

Special.Name: Paint Dry
Special.Action_String: <User> sets the paint on <Target> to dry. <Target> will take <Damage> damage for 3 rounds.
